about_the_game:
The EX Graphic Baseset Dungeon is a tileset for RPG Maker MZ and MV to help your hero's journey continue. Let's dive deeper into the world.

 

With detailed pixel art tiles, you can let your creativity run wild, whether in deep mines, a castle prison, ruins, laboratories, industry, magical rituals, or ice dungeons.

 

There's a lot to discover, so let's get started!

 

You can also combine the set with the existing EX Baseset series to have even more freedom in creating your game!

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Contents:

For the MZ version

 

17 Tilesheets

・A1-A5 tiles:10 sheets

・B-E tiles:7 sheets

 

5 Character sheets

・Doors

・Switches

・Animation

・Animation_2

・Chests

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

 ・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
